    export as namespace React;
    
    declare namespace React {
    
        function createClass(spec: any): ClassicComponentClass;

            new (props?: any): ClassicComponentClass;
        }
    }
    
    declare global {
        namespace JSX {
            interface ElementAttributesProperty { }
        }
    }
